Unknown.translation: Glory of the union of True Guru and the devotees cannot be known or estimated in all the four directions, seven seas, in all the forests and nine regions.

Unknown.translation: This grandeur has not been heard or read in wondrous knowledge of the Vedas. It is not believed to exist in heavens, nether regions nor in the worldly regions.

Unknown.translation: It cannot be perceived in the four eons, three periods, four sections of the society and even in the six philosophical Scriptures.

Unknown.translation: The union of True Guru and his Sikhs is so indescribable and marvellous that such state is not heard or seen anywhere else. (197)
